channel.title: Learning on CAFfeZeit
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on CAFfeZeit

item.title: CAF Intro German learning path
item.description: We have already published a Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) learning path in German on our Github CAF Expert page. If you are new to the CAF please visit this short video series to learn more about this iterative and structured approach to adopt cloud as an enable for a digital transformation.
